modName: Immerisive Paperwork - A Dragonborn Gallery Item Checklist
summary: A list of all the items that are displayed in the Dragonborn Gallery (Legacy of the Dragonborn).
descriptionHtml:
This is a fairly comprehensive list of all the items being displayed or tracked by the mod Legacy of the Dragonborn that was created by Icecreamassassin and Crew.

I created it as a pen and paper check for quick reference.  I used the MCM menu within Skyrim to popuIate the list into a printable spreadsheet using Microsoft Excel.

All the Mods that are supported by Legacy of the Dragonborn are in the list:

Aetherium Armor and Weapons
Captured Fairies
Falskaar
Gray Cowl of the Nocturnal
Great Jar Hunt
Helgen Reborn
Immersive Weapons and Armor
Immersive Jewelry
Konahrik's Accoutrements
Mad Masker
More Interesting Loot
Skyrim Unique Treasures
Something Fishy
Trophy Heads
Wheels of Lull
Wyrmstooth


I've also included a worksheet for the Thieves Guild quests.  It includes checkboxes to track progress toward unlocking all earned items.  75 in total, 125 if you want the "special safe"

and

I also created (copied, thanks wiki!) a worksheet for finding and tracking all of the Barenziah stones.



I welcome any and all feedback as well as anything that needs to be added and don't forget to send the guys over at the Dragonborn Gallery Mod a big Thank You for creating such a wonderful mod!


To use:
Download Manually and unpack .rar
Open with Microsoft Excel or various free Office sites.
author: Nowak1981
